Lyric:
[by:nemo0225]
[00:35.34]People killin' People dyin'
[00:37.53]Children hurt and you hear them crying
[00:39.76]Can you practice what you preach
[00:41.85]Or would you turn the other cheek
[00:44.11]Father father father, help us
[00:46.32]Send some guidance from above
[00:46.97]Cause right now people have me questionin'
[00:48.87]Where is the love?
[00:51.84]The love
[00:54.58]The love
[00:56.77]Where is the love, the love, my love?
[00:58.35]Where is the love?
[01:02.78]Where is the love?
[01:04.97]Where is the love, the love, my love?
[01:07.08]What's wrong with the world, mama?
[02:38.98]People livin' like they ain't got no mamas
[02:40.45]I think the whole world's addicted to the drama
[02:42.61]Only attracted to the things that'll bring the trauma
[02:44.76]Overseas ya we tryin' to stop terrorism
[02:47.00]But we still got terrorists here livin'
[02:49.08]In the U.S.A, the big C.I.A
[02:51.30]The bloods and the crips, and the KKK
[02:53.68]But if you only got love for your own ways
[02:55.90]Then you only leave space to discriminate
[02:58.13]To discriminate only generates hate
[03:00.28]And when you hate, then you're bound to get irate
[03:02.74]Madness is what you demonstrate
[03:05.47]And that's exactly how anger works and operates
[03:07.04]Man ya gotta have love, this'll set us straight
[03:09.40]Take control of your mind and meditate
[03:11.35]Let your soul gravitate
[03:13.64]to the love ya'll (to the love ya'll)
[03:14.88]to the love ya'll (to the love ya'll)
[03:19.35]to the love ya'll (to the love ya'll)
[03:23.65]to the love ya'll (to the love ya'll)
[03:28.03]People killin' People dyin'
[03:32.44]Children hurt and you hear them crying
[03:34.73]Can you practice what you preach
[03:36.88]Or would you turn the other cheek
[03:39.03]Father father father, help us
[03:41.27]Send some guidance from above
[03:43.30]Cause right now people have me questionin'
[03:45.38]Where is the love?
[03:48.38]The love
[03:51.54]The love
[03:53.82]Where is the love, the love, my love?
[03:55.49]Where is the love?
[03:59.92]Where is the love?
[04:02.10]Where is the love, the love, my love?
[04:04.21]
